metadata.Title: CVE-2018-4188 on Ubuntu 21.10 (impish) - medium.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in certain Apple products. iOS before 11.4 is affected. Safari before 11.1.1 is affected. iCloud before 7.5 on Windows is affected. iTunes before 12.7.5 on Windows is affected. tvOS before 11.4 is affected. The issue involves the "WebKit" component. It allows remote attackers to spoof the address bar via a crafted web site.

notes.Note: jdstrand> webkit receives limited support. For details, see https://wiki.ubuntu.com/SecurityTeam/FAQ#webkit webkit in Ubuntu uses the JavaScriptCore (JSC) engine, not V8 mdeslaur> no indication that this affects webkit2gtk

criterions.comment: qtwebkit-opensource-src package in impish is affected and may need fixing.
